notes.console_log: Wrapped 2 unwrapped console.log statements in useArmstrongDocUpload.ts. All other console.log statements were already inside if (import.meta.env.DEV) guards or in seed/cleanup hooks (intentional).
notes.any_types: Changed 64 catch (err: any) blocks to catch (err: unknown) with safe err instanceof Error ? err.message : String(err) extraction pattern across 34 files.
notes.unused_imports: No unused imports detected via tsc --noUnusedLocals. ESLint no-unused-vars is disabled in project config.
notes.empty_catches: Added console.error to 3 truly empty catch {} blocks: SelfieAdsSummary.tsx, LeadManagerStudioSummary.tsx, FutureRoomAkte.tsx. All other catch blocks had intentional error handling (toast.error, return value, or comment explanation).
notes.todos: 4 real TODO comments cataloged in spec/audit/todo_audit_2026-02-21.json. Pattern matches like SECURITY_TODOS variable and placeholder data excluded.
